mapper.update: update WATER_QUALITY_ESTIMATE_CPOI set SEC_ID = #{secId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QA_ID = #{qaId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONITOR_TIME = #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EVALUATION_METHOD = #{evaluationMethod,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PH_T = #{phT,jdbcType=REAL}, DIS_OXYGEN_T = #{disOxygenT,jdbcType=REAL}, PERMANGANATE_T = #{permanganateT,jdbcType=REAL}, OX_DEMAND_T = #{oxDemandT,jdbcType=REAL}, BO_DEMAND_T = #{boDemandT,jdbcType=REAL}, AMMONIA_T = #{ammoniaT,jdbcType=REAL}, PHOSPHORUS_T = #{phosphorusT,jdbcType=REAL}, COPPER_T = #{copperT,jdbcType=REAL}, ZINC_T = #{zincT,jdbcType=REAL}, FLUORIDE_T = #{fluorideT,jdbcType=REAL}, SELENIUM_T = #{seleniumT,jdbcType=REAL}, ARSENIC_T = #{arsenicT,jdbcType=REAL}, MERCURY_T = #{mercuryT,jdbcType=REAL}, CADMIUM_T = #{cadmiumT,jdbcType=REAL}, CHROMIUM_T = #{chromiumT,jdbcType=REAL}, LEAD_T = #{leadT,jdbcType=REAL}, CYANIDE_T = #{cyanideT,jdbcType=REAL}, PHENOL_T = #{phenolT,jdbcType=REAL}, PETROLEUM_T = #{petroleumT,jdbcType=REAL}, SURFACTANT_T = #{surfactantT,jdbcType=REAL}, SULFIDE_T = #{sulfideT,jdbcType=REAL}, QA_TYPE = #{qaType,jdbcType=REAL}, QA_STATUS = #{qaStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
